bibl.title: Notes on P.Oxy. 3722 (Commentary on Anacreon).
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LIV, 3722 (= M.-P.3 87.01; LDAB 201). Critical notes. - 1. Anacreon invokes Eubuleus, the swineherd [fr. 15, col. i, 15-18]. - 2. A loving woman [fr. 25, col. ii, 10-13]. - 3. Alcaeus [fr. 33, 9-12]. - 4. Chamaeleon [fr. 44, 4]. - 5. How to handle a shield-grip [fr. 52, 5-8].
bibl.seg: BERNSDORFF Hans, Notes on P.Oxy. 3722 (Commentary on Anacreon).

P. Oxy. LIV, 3722 (= M.-P.3 87.01; LDAB 201). Critical notes. - 1. Anacreon invokes Eubuleus, the swineherd [fr. 15, col. i, 15-18]. - 2. A loving woman [fr. 25, col. ii, 10-13]. - 3. Alcaeus [fr. 33, 9-12]. - 4. Chamaeleon [fr. 44, 4]. - 5. How to handle a shield-grip [fr. 52, 5-8].
